record.name: SheetProperties
record.description: Describes a chart sheet properties record.
record.author: Glen Stampoultzis (glens at apache.org)

bit.name: chart type manually formatted
bit.description: Has the chart type been manually formatted?

bit.name: plot visible only
bit.description: Only show visible cells on the chart.

bit.name: do not size with window
bit.description: Do not size the chart when the window changes size

bit.name: default plot dimensions
bit.description: Indicates that the default area dimensions should be used.

const.name: zero
const.description: Empty cells are treated as zero
